subtitle: A quick and easy-to-make trifle with delicious Amaretto liqueur-soaked ratafia biscuits.

method.text: Roughly break the ratafia biscuits. Place in the base of a trifle bowl. Sprinkle over the Amaretto. Leave to stand for 10 min.
Top with the raspberries. Spoon over the custard. Lightly whip the cream with the sugar, vanilla and lemon juice until it forms soft peaks.
Spoon the cream mixture over the custard. Decorate with raspberries.

title: Vanilla and raspberry syllabub trifle
